#line 1 "array-const-in.txt" 
half4 main () : COLOR0 {
	float2 poisson[8] = {
		float2( 0.0, 0.0),
		float2( 0.527837,-0.085868),
		float2(-0.040088, 0.536087),
		float2(-0.670445,-0.179949),
		float2(-0.419418,-0.616039),
		float2( 0.440453,-0.639399),
		float2(-0.757088, 0.349334),
		float2( 0.574619, 0.685879),
	};
	half4 c = 0;
	for (int i = 0; i < 8; ++i)
		c.xy += poisson[i];
	return c;
}
